tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A chitinous, scorpion-like tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that the stinger is venomous.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldPanther(manticore tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] chitinous, scorpion-like tails sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're each about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that the stingers are venomous.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldPanther(manticore-like tails)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] manticore tail, which is tipped with a scorpion-like stinger almost dripping with aphrodisiac demon. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] manticore tails, which are tipped with scorpion-like stingers almost dripping with aphrodisiac venom. #ENDIF
